00011 bool
00012 MMLmsqrt::validate() {
00013         if (validated) {
00014                 return valid;
00015         }
00016         validated = true;
00017         validateChildren(1, true);
00018         if (!valid) return false;
00019 
00020         // if there are more than one children: construct an inferred mrow
00021         if (first != last) {
00022                 MMLNode *mrow = owner->createInferredmrow(this);
00023                 appendChild(mrow);

00027 void
00028 MMLmsqrt::doLayout(MML::Attributes *a) const {
00029         MMLNode *sqrt = first;
00030         sqrt->layout(a);
00031         v_unit linethickness(0.05, l_unit::em);
00032         float lineth = linethickness.get(a);
00033         gui->ascent = sqrt->getAscent() + 4*lineth;
00034         gui->descent = sqrt->getDescent();
00035         float d = (gui->ascent + gui->descent)/12;
00036         gui->width = sqrt->getWidth()+5*d;
00037         sqrt->setX(5*d);
00038 }
00039 void
00040 MMLmsqrt::doPaint(MML::Attributes *a) const {
00041         MMLNode *sqrt = first;
00042         v_unit linethickness(0.05, l_unit::em);
00043         float lineth = linethickness.get(a);
00044         sqrt->paint(a);
00045 
00046         float ly = -sqrt->getAscent() - 3.5*lineth;
00047         float d = (gui->ascent + gui->descent)/12;
00048         float bx = sqrt->getX();
00049         v_unit ex = v_unit(-0.5, v_unit::ex);
00050         float hex = ex.get(a);
00051 
00052         float x[10], y[10];
00053         float px[5], py[5];
00054         float t[4];
00055         px[0] = 0;      py[0] = 0.7*hex;
00056         px[1] = d;      py[1] = hex;
00057         px[2] = 3*d;    py[2] = gui->descent/2;
00058         px[3] = bx;     py[3] = ly;
00059         px[4] = gui->width;  py[4] = ly;
00060         t[0] = lineth/2;
00061         t[1] = 2*lineth;
00062         t[2] = t[3] = lineth;
00063         rootPoints(px, py, t, x, y);
00064         a->p->drawPolygon(10, x, y);
00065 }
00066 void
00067 MMLmsqrt::rootPoints(float px[5], float py[5], float t[4],
00068                 float x[10], float y[10]) {
00069         float a[4];
00070         float hx, hy;
00071         a[0] = atan2(py[1]-py[0], px[1]-px[0]);
00072         a[1] = atan2(py[2]-py[1], px[2]-px[1]);
00073         a[2] = atan2(py[3]-py[2], px[3]-px[2]);
00074         a[3] = atan2(py[4]-py[3], px[4]-px[3]);
00075 
00076         x[0] = px[0] - sin(a[0])*t[0]/2;
00077         y[0] = py[0] + cos(a[0])*t[0]/2;
00078         hx = px[1] - sin(a[1])*t[1]/2;
00079         hy = py[1] + cos(a[1])*t[1]/2;
00080         x[1] = (x[0]*tan(a[0])-hx*tan(a[1])+hy-y[0]) / (tan(a[0])-tan(a[1]));
00081         y[1] = (x[1]-x[0])*tan(a[0])+y[0];
00082         hx = px[2] - sin(a[2])*t[2]/2;
00083         hy = py[2] + cos(a[2])*t[2]/2;
00084         x[2] = (x[1]*tan(a[1])-hx*tan(a[2])+hy-y[1]) / (tan(a[1])-tan(a[2]));
00085         y[2] = (x[2]-x[1])*tan(a[1])+y[1];
00086         hx = px[3] - sin(a[3])*t[3]/2;
00087         hy = py[3] + cos(a[3])*t[3]/2;
00088         x[3] = (x[2]*tan(a[2])-hx*tan(a[3])+hy-y[2]) / (tan(a[2])-tan(a[3]));
00089         y[3] = (x[3]-x[2])*tan(a[2])+y[2];
00090         x[4] = px[4] - sin(a[3])*t[3]/2;
00091         y[4] = py[4] + cos(a[3])*t[3]/2;
00092 
00093         x[9] = px[0] + sin(a[0])*t[0]/2;
00094         y[9] = py[0] - cos(a[0])*t[0]/2;
00095         hx = px[1] + sin(a[1])*t[1]/2;
00096         hy = py[1] - cos(a[1])*t[1]/2;
00097         x[8] = (x[9]*tan(a[0])-hx*tan(a[1])+hy-y[9]) / (tan(a[0])-tan(a[1]));
00098         y[8] = (x[8]-x[9])*tan(a[0])+y[9];
00099         hx = px[2] + sin(a[2])*t[2]/2;
00100         hy = py[2] - cos(a[2])*t[2]/2;
00101         x[7] = (x[8]*tan(a[1])-hx*tan(a[2])+hy-y[8]) / (tan(a[1])-tan(a[2]));
00102         y[7] = (x[7]-x[8])*tan(a[1])+y[8];
00103         hx = px[3] + sin(a[3])*t[3]/2;
00104         hy = py[3] - cos(a[3])*t[3]/2;
00105         x[6] = (x[7]*tan(a[2])-hx*tan(a[3])+hy-y[7]) / (tan(a[2])-tan(a[3]));
00106         y[6] = (x[6]-x[7])*tan(a[2])+y[7];
00107         x[5] = px[4] + sin(a[3])*t[3]/2;
00108         y[5] = py[4] - cos(a[3])*t[3]/2;
00109 }
